BackstoryDef.title: Alchemist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to continuing [PAWN_possessive] master’s quest to discover the formula for the legendary Panacea Elixir and cure all of the world’s illnesses. [PAWN_pronoun] became renowned as an expert in medicine, and many people came to [PAWN_objective] when they were sick or injured.

BackstoryDef.title: Chivalrous knight
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived to uphold [PAWN_possessive] oaths as a knight. [PAWN_pronoun] protected the weak and defenseless, gave succour to the poor, and always refused any form of reward beyond a word of thanks for [PAWN_possessive] actions.

BackstoryDef.title: Disgraced knight
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] swore an oath when [PAWN_pronoun] became a knight to "never refuse a challenge from an equal." However, when challenged to a duel by a fellow knight for accidentally causing offense, [PAWN_nameDef] fled.

BackstoryDef.title: Knight errant
BackstoryDef.description: In order to prove [PAWN_objective]self, [PAWN_nameDef] set off on a quest to seek a legendary relic. Many said that such a thing was impossible, and that the relic did not even exist. However, [PAWN_nameDef]'s oaths as a knight stated that [PAWN_pronoun] must “persevere to the end in any enterprise begun” and [PAWN_pronoun] refused to lose hope.

BackstoryDef.title: Unscrupulous knight
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] held to [PAWN_possessive] oaths as a knight to help those in need, but only if there was something in it for [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_pronoun] frequently accepted payments and bribes and was very slow to do anything for those that couldn’t pay.

BackstoryDef.title: Well-travelled merchant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt in luxury wares. [PAWN_pronoun] frequently travelled far from home in order to acquire rare goods. [PAWN_nameDef] was extremely personable, and was always able to get the price [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

BackstoryDef.title: Local merchant
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] dealt in everyday goods. [PAWN_pronoun] rarely journeyed as far as merchants who dealt in more exotic wares, instead travelling to small local farming villages to buy basics like wool and flour that [PAWN_pronoun] brought back to the city to sell.

BackstoryDef.title: Beloved king
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the king of the realm. [PAWN_pronoun] did [PAWN_possessive] best to be a wise and just ruler and was widely loved by [PAWN_possessive] subjects.

BackstoryDef.title: Beloved queen
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the queen of the realm. [PAWN_pronoun] did [PAWN_possessive] best to be a wise and just ruler and was widely loved by [PAWN_possessive] subjects.

BackstoryDef.title: Mad king
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the king of the realm. The absolute power [PAWN_pronoun] had drove [PAWN_objective] insane and [PAWN_pronoun] was widely considered to be a dangerous tyrant. [PAWN_pronoun] remained unchecked due to the machinations of those who benefitted from [PAWN_possessive] madness. [PAWN_nameDef] was incredibly paranoid, and frequently ordered the execution of innocent people for imagined assassination plots.

BackstoryDef.title: Mad queen
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the queen of the realm. The absolute power [PAWN_pronoun] had drove [PAWN_objective] insane and [PAWN_pronoun] was widely considered to be a dangerous tyrant. [PAWN_pronoun] remained unchecked due to the machinations of those who benefitted from [PAWN_possessive] madness. [PAWN_nameDef] was incredibly paranoid, and frequently ordered the execution of innocent people for imagined assassination plots.

BackstoryDef.title: Heir apparent
BackstoryDef.description: As the heir to the crown, [PAWN_nameDef] had an endless list of royal duties to attend to. [PAWN_possessive] future as monarch depended on gaining the confidence of the royal court and [PAWN_pronoun] took every opportunity to display [PAWN_possessive] leadership and decision making skills. [PAWN_nameDef] also frequently had to meet with prospective marriage partners.

BackstoryDef.title: Renegade royal
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]’s father was a cruel and corrupt king. He outright ignored his starving subjects and had anyone who said anything against him tortured and killed. [PAWN_nameDef] could stand for it no longer, and fled the kingdom with [PAWN_possessive] allies and some peasant refugees in order to begin building an army to overthrow the tyrant.

BackstoryDef.title: Runaway royal
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] couldn’t take the pressure of being the future ruler of the kingdom. [PAWN_pronoun] fled to distant lands, disguising [PAWN_objective]self as a wealthy merchant who happened to be selling some “legitimately acquired” royal silverware.

BackstoryDef.title: Lady-in-waiting
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the personal attendant to the queen herself. [PAWN_pronoun] kept the queen informed about all of the gossip and goings-on of the court, took care of correspondence on the queen’s behalf, and supervised the queen’s other attendants. [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed sewing and embroidery, and sometimes helped in taking care of the queen’s extensive wardrobe, even though such a task was below her station.

BackstoryDef.title: Wise royal advisor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an advisor to the reigning monarch. [PAWN_pronoun] tried [PAWN_possessive] best to advocate for the interests of the commonfolk, being of the opinion that without the peasantry, the kingdom would collapse.

BackstoryDef.title: Greedy royal advisor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was an advisor to the reigning monarch. Most of [PAWN_possessive] advice was self-serving, and [PAWN_nameDef] was able to become obscenely wealthy and powerful by subtly guiding the decisions of the Crown to always favour [PAWN_possessive] interests.

BackstoryDef.title: Landowner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] held a considerable amount of land. [PAWN_pronoun] granted use of this land to vassal farmers in exchange for a share of what they grew. [PAWN_nameDef] had to be at least vaguely knowledgeable about agriculture in order to properly manage [PAWN_possessive] lands.

BackstoryDef.title: Courtier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the royal court. [PAWN_pronoun] had very little political knowledge and did not have a formal role within the court. [PAWN_pronoun] was simply there as a “close friend of the royal family.” Despite this, [PAWN_nameDef] tried to make [PAWN_objective]self useful in various ways, such as keeping the king and queen informed of any useful gossip and offering advice on personal matters.

BackstoryDef.title: Stable master
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran the stables of a noble family. [PAWN_pronoun] oversaw the stablehands, helped with caring for the animals, and provided veterinary care. [PAWN_nameDef] was even entrusted with assisting with the buying and selling of the horses due to [PAWN_possessive] extensive knowledge.

BackstoryDef.title: Milkmaid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was employed by a wealthy family to milk their cows. [PAWN_pronoun] was also tasked with churning the milk into cream and butter. [PAWN_nameDef] worked with a number of other milkmaids, and [PAWN_pronoun] enjoyed chatting with them as [PAWN_pronoun] worked.

BackstoryDef.title: Houndmaster
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took care of the royal hunting hounds. [PAWN_pronoun] trained the dogs to respond to the sound of [PAWN_possessive] hunting horn. [PAWN_nameDef] cared deeply for every single one of his charges. If a dog was injured or sick, [PAWN_pronoun] spared no effort in nursing it back to health.

BackstoryDef.title: Chambermaid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] kept the castle [PAWN_pronoun] worked in clean. [PAWN_possessive] most common task was sweeping up. [PAWN_pronoun] also polished any gold or silver, kept the fireplaces lit, and made the beds. If [PAWN_pronoun] managed to finish [PAWN_possessive] work early, [PAWN_nameDef] would go to help out in the kitchens and chat with the cooks there.

BackstoryDef.title: Castle laundress
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] washed the bedding and clothes of everyone who lived in the castle. [PAWN_pronoun] was quite strong from carrying the water used to fill the wooden washing basins and from handling heavy, wet linen every day.

BackstoryDef.title: Royal cook
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of the royal kitchens and all who worked within them. [PAWN_pronoun] was a fantastic cook and was especially renowned for [PAWN_possessive] banquet feasts. [PAWN_pronoun] ran [PAWN_possessive] kitchen well, and was generally liked and respected by those who worked under [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Goldsmith
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted jewellery and other trinkets out of gold. Because he worked with such valuable materials, [PAWN_possessive] customers tended to be almost exclusively wealthy nobles. [PAWN_nameDef] had to know how to behave appropriately when dealing with the upper class, and was an expert on etiquette.

BackstoryDef.title: Silversmith
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted jewellery and other trinkets out of silver. Most of [PAWN_possessive] customers were successful, worldly merchants. [PAWN_nameDef] learned a great deal about all manner of things from listening to tales of [PAWN_possessive] customers’ travels.

BackstoryDef.title: Busy blacksmith
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] forged tools and weapons from metal. [PAWN_pronoun] worked in a town that was along a busy trade route, and had to be skilled at making and repairing a large variety of goods for the people who lived there, as well as for the many travellers who passed through. Constantly hammering metal made [PAWN_nameDef] extremely strong.

BackstoryDef.title: Village blacksmith
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] forged tools and weapons from metal. [PAWN_pronoun] worked in a small village and mostly made and repaired farming tools. Proper coal for the smithy was hard to come by, and [PAWN_nameDef] instead used charcoal made from wood that [PAWN_pronoun] chopped [PAWN_objective]self. Constantly hammering metal made [PAWN_nameDef] extremely strong.

BackstoryDef.title: Cobbler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] made and repaired boots, shoes, and clogs. [PAWN_nameDef] was very good with [PAWN_possessive] customers, and often engaged in idle chit-chat with them while [PAWN_pronoun] was taking their measurements.

BackstoryDef.title: Kindly cartwright
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] built and repaired wooden carts and wagons. Merchants and traders frequented [PAWN_possessive] workshop. However, [PAWN_pronoun] most commonly provided [PAWN_possessive] services to poor farmers, often at a discount. The grateful farmers provided [PAWN_nameDef] with so many home-cooked meals, that [PAWN_pronoun] hardly ever had to cook for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Seamstress
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] sewed and mended clothing and other items made of fabric. Time and materials permitting, [PAWN_pronoun] liked to add little embroidered flowers to the things [PAWN_pronoun] made.

BackstoryDef.title: Stonemason
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] shaped rough chunks of rock into usable bricks, which [PAWN_pronoun] used to build with. [PAWN_pronoun] never lived in one place for long, going wherever there was work to do.

BackstoryDef.title: Carpenter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] cut wood into usable planks which [PAWN_pronoun] provided to builders. [PAWN_pronoun] also created finely crafted furniture, utensils, and tools. [PAWN_nameDef] had to be quite good at math in order to correctly calculate measurements for [PAWN_possessive] work.

BackstoryDef.title: Fishmonger
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] sold fish at the market. Because [PAWN_possessive] wares were quick to spoil, [PAWN_nameDef] had to be relentless when it came to sales in order to unload [PAWN_possessive] stock quickly. [PAWN_pronoun] was well known for [PAWN_possessive] loud voice carrying across the market all day long, crying out “fish for sale!”

BackstoryDef.title: Net fisher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] owned a small boat which [PAWN_pronoun] used to earn a living through fishing. [PAWN_pronoun] mainly fished using nets which [PAWN_pronoun] wove and repaired [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Weir fisher
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] built a weir across the river that [PAWN_pronoun] lived next to in order to catch fish. The flow of the river was rapid, meaning [PAWN_nameDef] had to frequently repair and replace [PAWN_possessive] fish traps.

BackstoryDef.title: Woodcutter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] chopped wood which [PAWN_pronoun] sold as fuel and building material. [PAWN_pronoun] spent much of [PAWN_possessive] time deep inside a dense and dangerous forest, and had to know how to defend [PAWN_objective]self from animal attacks.

BackstoryDef.title: Shepherd
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to a large flock of sheep. [PAWN_pronoun] led a relatively isolated life, living far from civilization in a small covered wagon with [PAWN_possessive] sheep and herding dogs.

BackstoryDef.title: Crop farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] worked the fields, growing crops such as wheat, barley, and various vegetables. It was often gruelling work, but [PAWN_nameDef]’s fellow farmers were always willing to pitch in and help [PAWN_objective], just as [PAWN_pronoun] was always willing to help them.

BackstoryDef.title: Miller
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a mill, which was used to grind grain into flour. While the mill usually used windpower to run, [PAWN_nameDef] had a donkey that helped to turn the millstone on days when the weather was unfavourable.

BackstoryDef.title: Vassal footsoldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was often called upon for military service by [PAWN_possessive] liege lord. Because [PAWN_pronoun] could not afford a horse, [PAWN_nameDef] served as a footsoldier. [PAWN_pronoun] was promised that any military campaign [PAWN_pronoun] served in would be finished by harvest season so [PAWN_pronoun] could get back to [PAWN_possessive] farm.

BackstoryDef.title: Vassal longbowman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] marched with [PAWN_possessive] liege lord’s army as a longbowman. [PAWN_pronoun] was well practised at marksmanship, having often hunted for food with a small homemade bow, and proved to be incredibly deadly when given a professionally made weapon.

BackstoryDef.title: Playwright
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dramatist. While such a profession was normally not particularly lucrative, [PAWN_nameDef] and the actors [PAWN_pronoun] worked with had a wealthy patron who paid them all handsomely.

BackstoryDef.title: Poet
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for [PAWN_possessive] poetry. [PAWN_possessive] works were often quite bawdy, earning [PAWN_objective] both fans and detractors.

BackstoryDef.title: Portrait artist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] painted portraits for wealthy aristocrats. [PAWN_pronoun] was always careful to depict [PAWN_possessive] clients as flatteringly as possible, and was praised for [PAWN_possessive] dedication to “realism” by those [PAWN_pronoun] painted.

BackstoryDef.title: Puppeteer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled around in [PAWN_possessive] brightly painted donkey cart, putting on comedic puppet shows wherever there was an audience. [PAWN_nameDef] crafted the marionettes for [PAWN_possessive] show [PAWN_objective]self, and occasionally spoke to them as though they were real people when there was nobody else around.

BackstoryDef.title: Jester
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was employed by the royal court to provide amusement. Although [PAWN_nameDef] acted foolish in order to entertain, [PAWN_pronoun] was actually extremely smart and was a master at wordplay.

BackstoryDef.title: Acrobat
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled the kingdom performing amazing feats of acrobatics for audiences both noble and common. The highlight of [PAWN_possessive] act was contorting [PAWN_objective]self into a seemingly impossible position and then shooting a bow and arrow using [PAWN_possessive] feet.

BackstoryDef.title: Town crier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was employed as an official town crier. Everyday, [PAWN_pronoun] rang [PAWN_possessive] handbell and made announcements to the people of [PAWN_possessive] town. [PAWN_nameDef] had a booming voice and an air of authority, causing many to look to [PAWN_objective] as a community leader.

BackstoryDef.title: Innkeeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a large inn. The inn was used as both lodgings for travellers and as a community meeting spot for locals. [PAWN_nameDef] was kept busy hosting and providing food and drink for everyone.

BackstoryDef.title: Barber surgeon
BackstoryDef.description: On most days, [PAWN_nameDef] simply cut hair and trimmed and shaved beards. However, when required, [PAWN_pronoun] was called upon to perform amputations and surgeries due [PAWN_possessive] to steady hand and skill with a razor.

BackstoryDef.title: Midwife
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted women during pregnancy and childbirth. [PAWN_pronoun] mostly practiced in the small town that [PAWN_pronoun] lived in, but occasionally travelled to the smaller surrounding villages when needed.

BackstoryDef.title: Tavern wench
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served ale at a popular tavern. The customers were often rowdy, but [PAWN_nameDef] was both tough and charming and [PAWN_pronoun] always managed to keep them in line.

BackstoryDef.title: Hostler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to guests’ horses at an inn along a busy travelling route. [PAWN_pronoun] made sure the animals were fed, watered, rested, and even brushed. [PAWN_nameDef] could get even the most skittish or stubborn horses to cooperate with [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: Town guard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for the protection of [PAWN_possessive] town. [PAWN_pronoun] had to be skilled with both a sword and a bow in order to more effectively protect the townspeople from threats that came from both outside the walls and from within.

BackstoryDef.title: Lamplighter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for lighting the candles in the lamps that lined the streets of [PAWN_possessive] town. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the dawn shift, enjoying the solitude that the early morning brought.

BackstoryDef.title: Graveyard keeper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to the town cemetery. [PAWN_pronoun] dug graves as needed and made sure the cemetery was kept tidy. [PAWN_nameDef] knew the names on every tombstone and planted flowers for any of the deceased who did not get visitors.

BackstoryDef.title: Laundress
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] washed linens and clothes for the local inn. Thieves would sometimes attempt to steal the things that [PAWN_pronoun] hung up to dry, but the only thing they ever came away with were bumps and bruises from [PAWN_nameDef] deftly wielded broom.

BackstoryDef.title: Graverobber
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] robbed graves, relieving the dead of any valuables they had been buried with. [PAWN_pronoun] travelled frequently so as not to be caught, masquerading as a simple, honest merchant. [PAWN_possessive] prices were so cheap that customers rarely questioned why [PAWN_possessive] wares were so often covered in dirt.

BackstoryDef.title: Highwayman
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] stalked an isolated stretch of road, ambushing travellers in order to steal their valuables. He always offered [PAWN_possessive] victims a choice: “your money or your life.” Most chose the former, and [PAWN_nameDef] would ride away with [PAWN_possessive] loot before anyone had the time to get help.

BackstoryDef.title: Charitable nun
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took a vow of poverty so that [PAWN_pronoun] could wholly devote [PAWN_objective]self to helping the needy. [PAWN_pronoun] often worked with the sick and dying poor, aiding those who could be healed and comforting those who couldn’t be.

BackstoryDef.title: Monk scribe
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took a vow of silence so that [PAWN_pronoun] could wholly devote [PAWN_objective]self to serving and worshipping [PAWN_possessive] God. [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_objective] days painstakingly creating beautiful illuminated manuscripts, for which [PAWN_pronoun] mixed the inks [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: Scholar of philosophy
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wrote extensively on moral philosophy. The nature of ethics, of what it truly means to be “good” or “evil,” fascinated [PAWN_objective]. [PAWN_nameDef] was quite sociable for someone who spent hours locked away writing, and enjoyed having friendly discussions and debates with [PAWN_possessive] scholarly cohorts.

BackstoryDef.title: Reclusive witch
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was accused of practising witchcraft, an offence punishable by death. [PAWN_pronoun] fled [PAWN_possessive] village and travelled far away until [PAWN_pronoun] finally settled deep in a secluded forest. Desperate travellers who heard rumours of [PAWN_possessive] existence sometimes visited, begging for magic potions to cure their woes.

BackstoryDef.title: Seer
BackstoryDef.description: On a seemingly normal day, [PAWN_nameDef] suddenly developed a strange sensitivity to something hard to describe. [PAWN_pronoun] could somehow sense things before they happened and was able to make uncannily accurate predictions about the future. While some feared this power, many others willingly went to [PAWN_nameDef] for advice.

BackstoryDef.title: Village fool
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]’s very existence served as a form of entertainment for [PAWN_possessive] village. [PAWN_possessive] strange appearance and lack of intelligence was a source of derision, pity, and amusement for those around [PAWN_objective]. The people of [PAWN_nameDef]’s village fed and clothed [PAWN_objective] in exchange for [PAWN_possessive] unwitting service.

BackstoryDef.title: Monster slayer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] travelled far and wide, offering [PAWN_possessive] services as a slayer of monsters. [PAWN_pronoun] received a decent amount of work, mostly from peasants terrified of horrifying creatures stealing their children and livestock. The “monsters” almost always turned out to be wolves, but [PAWN_nameDef] got paid all the same. [PAWN_pronoun] held out hope that, someday, he would get to test [PAWN_objective]self against a real monster.
